name: Inventory Tracker
backend_requirements: 1. Item model: id, name (required), sku, quantity (integer), min_quantity, location
2. CRUD endpoints: GET /api/items, POST, PUT, DELETE
3. PUT /api/items/:id/adjust - accept {adjustment: +5 or -3} to modify quantity
frontend_requirements: 1. Item list table: name, SKU, quantity, location
2. Low stock items highlighted in red
3. Add item form with all fields
4. Quantity adjustment controls: +/- buttons or input
